author: Anne Bronte
message: All our talents increase in the using, and the every faculty, both good and bad, strengthen by exercise.
title: Thought of the day

author: Richard Bach
message: In order to live free and happily you must sacrifice boredom. It is not always an easy sacrifice.
title: Thought of the day

author: Desiderius Erasmus
message: The fox has many tricks. The hedgehog has but one. But that is the best of all.
title: Thought of the day

author: Arthur Rubinstein
message: Of course there is no formula for success except perhaps an unconditional acceptance of life and what it brings.
title: Thought of the day
